Class Person

java.lang.Object
  Person

public class Person
extends java.lang.Object

Person class contains info on person for a social network. It allows you to: Set a Person's name with Person(String name); Add friends to a person's friends list with addFriend(); Get (return) the friends a person has with getFriends() method; Unfriend Persons from a Person's friends list

Constructor Summary
Person(java.lang.String name)
          Sets the Person's name.
 
Method Summary
 void addFriend(Person friend)
          Adds the given friend to this Person's friends list.

          Gets a friend at a given index.
 java.lang.String getFriends()
          Gets a list of all of this Person's friends.

getFriend

public java.lang.String getFriend(int friendIndex)
Gets a friend at a given index.

Parameters:
friendIndex - the index at which to find the friend (starting at 0)
Returns:
the name of the friend at friendIndex, or "" if the friend is not present

getFriends

public java.lang.String getFriends()
Gets a list of all of this Person's friends.

Returns:
the names of the friends separated by a comma and a space. e.g. "Sara, Cheng-Han, Cay"
